text: Leopoldo María Panero (16 June 1948 - 5 March 2014) was a Spanish poet. He was often placed in the Novísimos group. He had fifteen poetic releases between 1970 and 2004. He was born in Madrid. Panero died from heart failure on 5 March 2014 in Madrid. He was 65 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Leopoldo María Panero biography Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Spanish poets Category:Writers from Madrid
title: Leopoldo María Panero
